content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court has decided to dissolve the marriage between two parties jz and vz vz will keep her surname and the children will reside with her as part of the divorce vz will receive a plot of land a residential building and a car as her personal property jz will be awarded the car vz has been ordered to pay compensation to jz for the higher value of matrimonial property acquired by her the court has also declared a joint obligation towards a third party but the details are not specified jz has been ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings while vz has been ordered to pay jzs costs both parties have been ordered to pay stamp duty and the costs of serving procedural documents overall the court has made various decisions regarding the division of property and costs in the divorce case
